summary: 1987  was a common year starting on Thursday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: 1987  was a common year starting on Thursday  of the Gregorian calendar, the 1987th year of the Common Era  and Anno Domini  designations, the 987th year of the 2nd millennium, the 87th year of the 20th century, and the 8th year of the 1980s decade.
